name: Fate of Oltanis
description:
Fate of Oltanis is a project I've been working on for the purpose of completing a Games Design course. You're an investigator tasked with exploring the Starcruiser Oltanis. Mysteriously, the crew had vanished completely with almost no traces of their whereabouts.

This level is not 100% complete due to running short on time. A proper ending will be added some time in the future.

NOTE: There are a lot of bugs that I am aware of. This will be addressed some time later in the future.
